price: Ó sọ pé: “Èmi kò nímọ̀ sí ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣe (lẹ́yìn mi).
arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلۡمِي بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla wamā ʿil'mī bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
